Indeed! I love weird fiction! And I have some suggestions for anybody looking for something new. Clark Ashton Smith was another great weird fiction writer. He was friends with Lovecraft and wrote some beautifully crafted short stories. In my opinion he is the best writer at "painting" a scene with his words. You can read almost all of his stories for free (legally) here http://www.eldritchdark.com/
Also if anyone is interested in comics, the Hellboy comics are some fantastic weird fiction / superhero / fantasy / sci-fi comics.
